text: Maruyamu no ko isa wa (inotte) itta. `Arra, watashi-tachi no omo yo, watashi-tachi no tame ni,(shokumotsu o narabeta) shokutaku o ten kara o oroshi ni nari, sorede watashi-tachi e no saisho no, mata saigo no kien to nasa re, anata kara no shirushi to shite kudasai. Watashi-tachi ni shoku o ataete kudasai. Hontoni anata wa mottomo sugureta yashinai omodesu
